Haku: Wow, this is indeed a soup house. And that person must be the NPC we're looking for, Soup Granny.

No-Face Man: Thank you both, you've been a great help. As a token of gratitude, I'll give you this map scroll. It has coordinates for the beach and the location of the next NPC, Qian Granny. She's not far from here.
Chihiro: Thank you so much! We'll go find Qian Granny.
